educationQuestions: What is your highest level of education completed?
How satisfied are you with the education you received?
What was your primary field of study?
How relevant is your education to your current job?
Do you feel your education prepared you well for your career?
What additional skills do you wish you had learned during your education?
How often do you engage in continuing education or professional development?
What is your preferred method of learning (e.g., online, in-person, hybrid)?
How do you rate the quality of the education system in your country?
What improvements would you suggest for the education system?
healthQuestions: How would you rate your overall health?
How often do you engage in physical exercise?
What is your primary source of health information?
How frequently do you visit a healthcare provider?
Are you satisfied with the healthcare services available to you?
What type of diet do you follow (e.g., vegetarian, vegan, non-vegetarian)?
How often do you experience stress?
Do you have access to mental health resources?
How do you rate the quality of healthcare in your country?
What improvements would you suggest for the healthcare system?
technologyQuestions: What is your favorite programming language?
How many years of experience do you have in technology?
How often do you update your technical skills?
What is your preferred platform for learning new tech skills?
How do you rate the impact of technology on your daily life?
Which technology trends are you most excited about?
How do you stay updated with the latest tech developments?
What is the biggest challenge you face in your tech career?
How satisfied are you with the technology tools you use at work?
What improvements would you suggest for the technology industry?
